DIY Picnic Basket: Create a personalized picnic basket using reusable materials like canvas, wood, or bamboo. You can add your favorite designs or patterns to make it unique.
Solar-Powered Picnic Basket: Incorporate solar panels into the design of the picnic basket to charge your phone or other electronic devices while you're out on a picnic.

Picnic Basket: Design a picnic basket that includes a built-in charging station for your electric scooter or bike.
